name: Save The Endangered Species
description:
My entry for the Creatus Jam. A very short GameJam Game, about shooting Dinos
Please ignore the minor bugs, e.g. the music button not working correctly and the ammo counter not working on the win and lose screen. 2 Days is a very short amount of time, so I couldn't fix everything.

The Dino Family Sprites are from https://itch.io/profile/arks @ScissorMarks
